title: Solar Flares
content:
Update on solar activity, how the sun’s behavior influences life on earth and the solar cycles that we are now... <!--more--> entering Lawrence Joseph is a seasoned investigative journalist who has been writing on science, nature, politics and business for over 25 years for such publications as the New York Times, Discover, Huffington and others.
During the past several years Larry has been conducting in depth research into the 2012 phenomenon – but not just the religious dimensions, , but science, such as contemporary solar physics, astronomical phenomena, and climatic changes.
He has written several books dealing with the impact of solar activity and climate change on civilization.
His most recent book, just released, is “Solar Cataclysm: How the Sun Shaped the Past and What We Can Do to Save Our Future” which is a continuation of his earlier publications dealing with the science behind the potential catastrophes resulting solar activity, energy, polar cap melts, climate change and agriculture.
